1661570.name: Over The Ruins
1661570.description:
In Over The Ruins you run a small blacksmithing/weapons shop in a post apocalyptic world.
You must mine scrap from the mines, processes it in different ways and forge your weapons to attend to your costumers needs!

The game has a strong focus on customization and interactive crafting of weapons, and even culinary. (More info about this aspect soon).

The game is set in very overgrown and rubbled ruins, from a distant post-apocalyptic past. You live near a busy road and have to serve the passing travellers on their weapon needs.
1661570.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
